title.rendered: How to Pick and Use Images That Will Dramatically Increase Your Conversion Rates

content.rendered:
Learn how to pick and use the right images and videos for your content in our webinar with Jumpstory. We’ll also provide some concrete examples of how to use images the right way

In This Webinar You Will Learn

Here’s a little summary of some of the subjects we cover in this webinar

  • The science behind image performance
  • How to avoid copyright issues when choosing images
  • How to pick the right images and videos for your content
  • How to use images and visual elements in your on-site messages and increase conversion rates
  • Concrete examples of how to use images the right way
